Class Sound

  • java.lang.Object
    • Sound

  • public class Sound
extends java.lang.Object
    The Sound class This class stores sound media, and allows specific AudioClips to be played, stopped, and looped. It also allows the stopping of all AudioClips created with this class, due to its static ArrayList all and static method stopAll().

    Course Information:

    ICS4U0 with Krasteva, V.

    Total Time Spent: 1.25 hours

    Version:
    6 06.09.2019 
     Version History:
 May 18:
 Vansh created the class. -- 0.25 hours
 May 27:
 Vansh created constructor, play method and stop method. -- 0.5 hour
 June 5:
 Vansh created static AudioClip ArrayList all to store all AudioClips made by the class, and static stopAll method to stop all Sounds. -- 0.5 hours
    Author:
    Maria Yampolsky and Vansh Juneja

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private javafx.scene.media.AudioClip ac
      This stores the AudioClip itself, at the path specified in the constructor.
      private static java.util.ArrayList<javafx.scene.media.AudioClip> all
      This stores a static List of all AudioClips created from this class.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Sound(java.lang.String path)
      This is the class constructor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void loop()
      This method loops the sound.
      void play()
      This method plays the sound.
      void stop()
      This method stops the sound.
      static void stopAll()
      This static method stops all AudioClips created with this class, by looping through the static ArrayList all, and calling stop() on each element.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • ac

        private final javafx.scene.media.AudioClip ac
        This stores the AudioClip itself, at the path specified in the constructor.

      • all

        private static final java.util.ArrayList<javafx.scene.media.AudioClip> all
        This stores a static List of all AudioClips created from this class.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Sound

        public Sound(java.lang.String path)
        This is the class constructor. It sets the global AudioClip to the Sound at the specified path, then adds it to the static all ArrayList.
        Parameters:
        path - The path of the AudioClip.

    • Method Detail

      • loop

        public void loop()
        This method loops the sound.

      • play

        public void play()
        This method plays the sound.

      • stop

        public void stop()
        This method stops the sound.

      • stopAll

        public static void stopAll()
        This static method stops all AudioClips created with this class, by looping through the static ArrayList all, and calling stop() on each element.
